entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches in low lying areas before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except south 50 gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
